name: ErudiFi
long_description: ErudiFi is a mission-driven technology company focused on expanding access to financial services for students. Operating as Danacita in Indonesia and Bukas in the Philippines, ErudiFi provides students a smarter way to pay for education and helps them build credit history. By providing financial inclusion to underserved students across the region, we believe we can drive generational transformation and build a better tomorrow.
one_liner: Digital financial services for students in Southeast Asia
